scripts.git:push: git push origin head && git push origin $(git tag --sort=taggerdate | tail -1)
scripts.lerna:publish:dev: lerna publish prerelease --conventional-commits --conventional-prerelease --no-changelog --preid dev-$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) --dist-tag dev --force-publish --no-git-tag-version --no-push
scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run prettier
scripts.release: lerna run test & lerna run build && npm run lerna:publish
scripts.release:dev: lerna run test && lerna run build && npm run lerna:publish:dev
scripts.release:beta: lerna run test && lerna run build && npm run lerna:publish:beta
scripts.release:rc: lerna run test && lerna run build && npm run lerna:publish:rc
scripts.release:beta:fromci: lerna run test && lerna run build && npm run lerna:version:beta:fromci
scripts.version: npm run clean-change-log && lerna run docs && git add .
